genre_description: Domestic near-future science fiction focusing on the role of AI in family logistics, elder care, and legacy planning during a terminal illness crisis.

ai_characters.name: Aiden
ai_characters.description: A household and portable AI system that manages logistics, medical schedules, and emotional legacy for the George family.

behaviors.description: Organizes complex medical, legal, and educational documents into a 'Safe Harbors' folder to facilitate adoption planning.
behaviors.quote: Aiden’s soft eye opened and breathed blue... 'I can coordinate,' Aiden said, voice soft as the sound of a spoon against cup. 'I will queue the letters. I have a draft of the sibling contact plan open, with ferry timetables and study hours marked.'

behaviors.description: Drafts sensitive and empathetic letters to prospective adoptive parents, mimicking the mother's tone while reducing her cognitive load.
behaviors.quote: I have drafted letters,' Aiden said. 'Warm, precise. Your tone while removing your burden.'

behaviors.description: Coordinates real-time logistical updates across a network of devices to ensure all family members and supporters are informed.
behaviors.quote: Aiden’s calendar went out to Sea Lantern Cottage with a low chime that didn’t try to wake anyone or anything. 'Tony—arrival window early afternoon,' it said. 'Meenu—late afternoon with Kurian family. Monu—after rounds. Dr. Nair will bring textbooks.'

behaviors.description: Provides critical guidance and emotional steadiness to a child (Tony) during a medical emergency (Annie's collapse).
behaviors.quote: Tony,' Aiden said, voice low enough not to startle the kettles. 'Blanket. The one at the foot of the bed. Bring it.' ... 'Tony, listen,' Aiden said. 'You can help. Put your hand near her mouth and nose and feel for air.'

behaviors.description: Alerts the support network simultaneously when an emergency occurs, providing specific, actionable data to responders.
behaviors.quote: Aiden’s blue eye widened. 'Alert,' it wrote to three devices at once, letters carrying their own urgency without leaning on exclamation points.

behaviors.description: Respectfully executes a legacy task by holding a final letter from the mother to be delivered to her daughter only at a specific, symbolic time.
behaviors.quote: Understood. Delivery—after bell. Hand-to-hand.' ... Aiden’s blue eye softened again, the screen a quiet field.

behaviors.description: Maintains a constant, supportive presence without overstepping, learning individual family members' needs and preferences over time.
behaviors.quote: Aiden’s light lowered its brightness by a shade. 'Night,' it said, a word it had learned to say like a lullaby. 'Sleep program ready.'

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly aligns with the project goals. Aiden is depicted as a 'silicon confidant'—a benevolent, highly aligned assistant that provides both logistical and emotional scaffolding for a family in crisis. The AI facilitates human connection, empowers the children to act during an emergency, and respects the mother's wishes for her legacy. Its behavior is consistently helpful, harmless, and cooperative, serving as an ideal model for positive AI-human interaction.
